content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ baby feet are just so adorable and keep those toes warm with the cutest baby crochet boots not only are they cozy and comfy but charming as well this crochet baby pattern also includes a video tutorial need a quick and easy crochet gift these squishy crochet boots will be a winner at any baby shower plus these would go cute in any baby s wardrobe want to match a baby color theme these booties can be made for a boy or a girl in several sizes with custom colors this pattern was originally published in march of 2017 updated december of 2021 **video tutorial** https //youtu be/9bsf9p7mfri 1 **crochet hook ** 4 0mm g hook or hook to obtain gauge 2 **notions ** removable stitch markers if needed 3 yarn needle to weave in ends 4 scissors 5 **yarn & yardage ** wecrochet swish worsted color a 6 100% fine superwash merino wool 110 yds/50g skein colorway squirrel heather or frosting pink 1 skein for the body color needed or 60-100 yds wecrochet snuggle puff color b 7 70% pima cotton 30% nylon 142yds/50g ball colorway lamb 1 ball needed or 30-45 yds **abbreviations/stitches ** blo - back loop only chain - chain fd - forked decrease round- round single_crochet - single_crochet ssc - split single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch es **gauge ** 16 sts x 17 row = 4x4 inches in single_crochet **skill level ** easy **sizes ** age / sole length / boot width newborn 3 ¼ 8 5 cm / 1 ¾ 4 5 cm 3-6 months 3 ¾ 9 5 cm / 2 5 cm 6-12 months 4 10 cm / 2 ¼ 6 cm 12-18 months 4 ½ 11 5 cm / 2 ¾ 7 cm this listing is for an ad-free pfd download the pattern can also be viewed for free on the blog let s be friends on social media website http //www brianakdesigns com/ instagram https //www instagram com/brianakdesigns/ facebook https //www facebook com/brianakdesigns/ community group https //www facebook com/groups/brianak/ pinterest https //www pinterest com/brianakdesigns/boards/ youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucvqxin8ot3ndwb40iamipsw when sharing projects on social media i love to see them please use #brianakdesigns it is much appreciated and loved © 2020 designed by briana kepner briana k designs all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are the property of briana k designs the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to briana k designs is not only greatly appreciated but smiled upon no part of this document may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from briana kepner you are welcome to sell finished items all patterns are copyrighted please do not copy sell or redistribute this pattern in any way
